initial_strategy: I tried to use the example scene to guide which triangles I used in my tests. For example, if the example had two blue triangles and one red triangle, I would create a scene with only the two blue triangles to see if that combination would also work, which meant the red triangle wasn't needed.
final_strategy: Once I decided on a rule, I tried to test other combinations to see if I could prove that the rule was incorrect.
